      • reactTagForTouch

        public int reactTagForTouch(float touchX,
                            float touchY)
        Description copied from interface: ReactCompoundView
        Return react tag for touched element. Event coordinates are relative to the view
        Specified by:
        reactTagForTouch in interface ReactCompoundView
        Parameters:
        touchX - the X touch coordinate relative to the view
        touchY - the Y touch coordinate relative to the view
